review: I like that it's small and easy to use! I've had to call for help fixing it twice now, they were easy fixes but it's the matter of the fact!
author: Tony Simpson

review: I had been streaming Netflix through my Blu-Ray, and was having constant issues with it locking up and needing to be re set. With the Amazon Fire, after a slight learning curve, I now have absolutely no issues streaming. I am hoping it has a long life, because it is wonderful.
author: Brewski

review: One of the best gifts I've received! Setup to running took me less than 2 minutes!!  The voice search capability is a huge benefit!! Awesome!
author: Bowler - VA

review: The Fire TV has exceeded my expectations! I still have an Apple TV but barely use it now. There's pros and cons to both but the Fire is one great little unit!
author: Christopher watkins

review: This is a great add-on for our viewing pleasure, to manage when you have a list of movies created. Sure wish there was some type of keyboard connectivity for searching ease. For now I use my computer to create my lists or search for selections and use the Fire TV for viewing movies or Fire recommendations.
author: RMWizer

review: Most channels I wanted to watch, you still needed a cable provider.  I was hoping this would replace my cable provider.  Other channels I can watch on my tv with an HDMI cable hooked up to my tablet, so Fire TV was essentially useless to me.
author: Tammera Nickerson

review: This is a solid little unit. Does everything I need it to do. Well done, Amazon.
author: Domenick Polesel

review: Would give it a 5 star if Vudu were available. Would be nice if Amazon added Vudu app to Fire TV.
author: Curtis Joy

review: We received the Fire TV as a Christmas gift!  WOW!  And along with a 40" flat screen!  Great kids!!!
author: Howie Beutler-Cruise "LoveToRead"
